author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content:
<@508125616940515329> 
```
participants:
  - el_type: ethereumjs
    el_image: ethereumjs-devnet-5-7f5c4c5:latest
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: consensys/teku:develop

network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  min_validator_withdrawability_delay: 1
  shard_committee_period: 1
  churn_limit_quotient: 16
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 256

snooper_enabled: true

additional_services:
  - dora
  
dora_params:
  image: "ethpandaops/dora:master-latest"
```

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: `ethereumjs-devnet-5-7f5c4c5:latest` is the image I built locally of ethereumjs

author: parithosh
content: ethereumJS seems to be stuck on mekong btw, e.g `ssh devops@teku-ethereumjs-1.mekong-devnet-0.ethpandaops.io` cc <@508125616940515329>

author: parithosh
content:
We now have the first clients interop-ing on pectra-devnet-5 specs ðŸ˜„

There's still some missed slot issues and we haven't run through all the tests yet. But we're getting there!

I'll pin a kurtosis config if someone wants to run tests locally and verify interop with their own clients.

author: parithosh
content:
pectra-devnet-5
```
participants:
  - el_type: besu
    el_image: ethpandaops/besu:24.12-develop-b143a56
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: consensys/teku:develop
    el_log_level: "debug"
    count: 3
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
  min_validator_withdrawability_delay: 1
  shard_committee_period: 1
  churn_limit_quotient: 16
  num_validator_keys_per_node: 256
additional_services:
  - dora
  - spamoor_blob
  - tx_spammer
dora_params:
  image: "ethpandaops/dora:master-latest"
snooper_enabled: true
spamoor_blob_params:
  throughput: 10 
  max_blobs: 2  
  max_pending: 40 
```

author: nflaig
content: Thanks for the config, managed to finalize devnet-5 with Lodestar<>Besu using `ethpandaops/lodestar:devnet-5` image, gonna try some interop with Teku now
